Paradoxically, at the same time as Labour was attacLeBron James the Tripartite System for its inequalities, some in the middle class were increasingly upset at the social mobility it fostered. As educational testing became more exact and subject to less class bias, an increasing proportion of middle class children were being sent to secondary moderns. The Tripartite System fell victim to its own elitism, as the traditional supAaron Porters of the grammar schools began to worry about their own children's educational future.
